item.description:
PHOTO-SHOOT ANNOUNCEMENT

WHEN: 1-2 hours starting at the posted time

THE SCENE: Trees, river, formal gardens, overlooks, some people

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers.

DIRECTIONS:
1.Route 128 to Route 2A west
2. Continue straight following signs for Concord Center (at some point the road will diverge right, with signs for Concord Center)
3. Once in the center take a right at the Colonial Inn (if there's a detour take a left and immediate right)
4. Continue straight till you pass the Bridge parking lot on your right (If you are on the detour continue straight until you come to the first major intersection with flashing lights I believe)
5. Take your first left and continue to the visitor's center parking lot on your left (if you are on the detour it will be on your right).

SOCIAL (OPTIONAL): Colonial Inn in the Center

OTHER:
RSVPs: It's best to let us know you are coming so we can look for you or alert you to any changes.

THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant, camera, Sweater

IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

*LAX: We meet at the time above. You have 30 minutes additional slack, after which we may leave to the painting site without you.

INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: PHOTO-SHOOT: Concord Old North Bridge Visitor's Center
